text:
@MikeCarlton01 Two thoughts. 

As a former editor of Communicable Diseases Intelligence, to identify small COVID-19 fires quickly, before they become bushfires. is essential

Policy is sound. 

Implementing it has many hurdles. Fear, privacy, bugs, acceptance, hacking, take up, oh and Amazon.

domain.name: Brand Vertical
domain.description: Top level entities that describe a Brands industry

domain.name: Brand Category
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

domain.name: Product
domain.description: Products created by Brands.  Examples: Ford Explorer, Apple iPhone.
